content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 6), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (15, 15) while at (8, 9).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 8), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (8, 9), outbound toward (15, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (13, 13) while at (11, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (20, 10) while at (10, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (13, 13) (previously at (14, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (9, 9), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (11, 12), outbound toward (15, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (10, 9), outbound toward (20, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "重要な展開が発生しました。ASQ1が敵航空部隊(BSQ1)を(13, 13)で発見しました。これは敵空母の近くに敵航空部隊が存在することを示唆しています。

    戦術分析:
    - BSQ1の位置から、敵空母は近傍に存在する可能性が高い
    - ASQ1は現在の位置から敵航空部隊を視認している
    - ASQ2は引き続き東方向の索敵を継続中

    次の作戦方針:
    1. ASQ1は現在位置から敵の動きを監視
    2. ASQ2は予定通り(20, 10)方向の索敵を継続
    3. 空母AC1は安全な位置に移動を続ける
    4. 敵空母の正確な位置を特定するため、慎重に索敵を続行",

    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 10) while at (10, 10).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (13, 12) while at (10, 10).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (14, 15) while at (13, 15).

- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (13, 12) while at (13, 15).

- your squadron(ASQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (13, 15).

- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 10) (previously at (14, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (13, 12) (previously at (14, 15)), HP 40/40.

- Your squadron ASQ2: position (14, 9), outbound toward (20, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "戦況が大きく変化しました！重要な発見と交戦が発生しています。

    戦況分析:
    - ASQ1が敵空母BC1を発見し、現在交戦中
    - 敵航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2の位置も特定
    - 敵空母BC1の位置は(14, 15)
    - ASQ1は攻撃を継続すべき
    - ASQ2は索敵を継続

    緊急作戦方針:
    1. ASQ1は敵空母BC1への攻撃を継続
    2. ASQ2は現在の位置から敵の動きを監視
    3. 空母AC1は安全な位置に留まり、航空部隊を支援
    4. 敵空母撃破のチャンスを逃さない",

    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Turn 5 of 30.

{
    "thinking": "戦況は有利に進展しています。重要な攻撃結果をまとめます。

    戦況分析:
    - ASQ1が敵空母BC1に21ダメージを与え、HP80/100に
    - AC1が敵航空部隊BSQ1に22ダメージを与え、HP21/40に
    - ASQ1は帰投中、ASQ2は索敵継続
    - 敵航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2の位置を把握

    次の作戦方針:
    1. ASQ1は空母に帰投し、次の攻撃に備える
    2. ASQ2は引き続き東方向の索敵を継続
    3. AC1は現在位置で防御態勢を維持
    4. 敵空母と航空部隊への攻撃のチャンスを伺う",

    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

{
    "thinking": "戦況は激しく変化しています。攻撃と索敵の結果を分析します。

    - ASQ1とASQ2は両方とも帰投中
    - AC1は現在位置で敵の動きを監視

    次の作戦方針:
    1. ASQ1とASQ2は空母に帰投し、補給と次の攻撃に備える
    2. AC1は現在位置で防御態勢を維持
    3. 敵空母BC1への攻撃タイミングを慎重に見計らう
    4. 両航空部隊の状態を回復させ、次の攻撃に備える",

    "action": {

}
